Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: Block incoming attacks, and retaliate with magic.
moveset: conjure a ward and retalliate the attack.
summon a spectral shield to ward off the enemy.

Fireball.name: Fireball
Fireball.description: Hurl an orb of elemental flame.
moveset: conjure and throw a ball of fire
throw a flaming orb at the enemy

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.description: Use divine energy to regain health.
moveset: summon a gentle glow
release a spark of golden light

Parry.name: Parry
Parry.description: Stop and retalliate an enemy attack with your might.
moveset: swing your blade, deflecting the attack.
block an incoming attack, and returning one of your own.

Dodge.name: Dodge
Dodge.description: Roll out of harm's way and use your speed to reengage.
moveset: duck out of the way of an attack, and dash at your opponent.
roll away from the enemy, flanking them, and striking back.

Reckless Charge.name: Reckless Charge
Reckless Charge.description: Heed no caution and charge at the enemy.
moveset: go straight towards the opponent, weapon in hand
dash straight ahead, swinging your weapon

Strategic Combat.name: Strategic Combat
Strategic Combat.description: Assess your opponent, and strike accordingly.
moveset: spot an opening and exploit it
assess the enemy's weakness, and strike at it

Ripose.name: Ripose
Ripose.description: Lunge at the enemy during their attack.
moveset: strike straight through the enemy's defence
stick your weapon into the enemy

Fist Fight!.name: Fist Fight!
Fist Fight!.description: Throw down the weapons and go at it the natural way.
moveset: using your hands, beat down at the opponent
swing with the ol' one-two, to the sound of fractures beneath

Unloaded Arsenal.name: Unloaded Arsenal
Unloaded Arsenal.description: Unleash the full range of your weapons training.
moveset:
insert two daggers into your opponent,
and a battleaxe in their ribcage

throw your weapon into the opponent,
unleashing a storm of arrows as it soars

Searing Brand.name: Searing Brand
Searing Brand.description: Brand the enemy with the mark of your faith.
moveset: lunge at enemy, flaming weapon in hand
conjure a flaming symbol in your palm, and strike with it

Hammer of Judgement.name: Hammer of Judgement
Hammer of Judgement.description: Swing down a divine hammer, and seal your opponent's fate.
moveset:
conjure a golden mace, and slam it down
as ripples of radiance pulse outward

reach for the heavens, and bring down a golden hammer
with enough force to shatter the earth beneath

Swan Dive.name: Swan Dive
Swan Dive.description: Leap into the air, and come down with a graceful swing.
moveset: jump up, and direct yourself down with your blade
leap upwards and dive at the enemy, blade ready to unsheathe

Blade Dance.name: Blade Dance
Blade Dance.description: Release a flurry of swings, striking the enemy with each.
moveset: unleash a hundred strikes, landing a hundred slices
dash past the enemy, as a thousand cuts echo

Nothing Personal.name: Nothing Personal
Nothing Personal.description: Unleash a precision strike, severing your enemy.
moveset:
quickly swing your blade past the enemy and stay still.
A fountain of blood streams out a moment later

move through the enemy with a speed that causes a sonic boom.
As you turn around, you see that you went through your opponent

Violent Strikes.name: Violent Strikes
Violent Strikes.description: Swing your weapon with fury and rage.
moveset: unleash a string of devastating blows
cleave at your enemy with raging strikes

Bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
Bloodthirst.description: Taste blood and use it to fuel your attacks.
moveset: lick the blood off your weapon and thrust it
fuel yourself with pain and unleash it upon your foe

HEADBUTT!.name: HEADBUTT!
moveset:
swing your head down with such force that
it unleashes a seismic wave

leap into the air and plummet down, head first
like a meteor onto the enemy

Smite.name: Smite
Smite.description: Strike your foe with divine energy.
moveset: smite down your foe with holy radiance
slam down with divine energy

Graceful Sweep.name: Graceful Sweep
moveset: swipe your weapon through the enemy
step forward and slash your weapon down elegantly

Endure.name: Endure
Endure.description: Power through the pain and recover lost health.
moveset: bite tightly down and suffer through the pain
groan in pain, but grit your teeth and power through

Sacred Fire.name: Sacred Fire
Sacred Fire.description: Release divine flames down upon your foes.
moveset: summon a small rain of golden fire
engulf the enemy in radiant flames

Eldritch Slam.name: Eldritch Slam
Eldritch Slam.description: Seek whatever entity may offer you their might.
moveset: summon a fel claw and strike
conjure an infernal whip and lash

Wolf Form.name: Wolf Form
Wolf Form.description: Imbue yourself with the power of the wolf.
moveset: grow large canines and bite down
howl and tear at the enemy

Critical Strike.name: Critical Strike
Critical Strike.description: Strike your foes where they're weak.
moveset: stab into an enemy's weak spot
assess a soft spot and stab it with your weapon

Rays of Gold.name: Rays of Gold
Rays of Gold.description: The gods bestow you with orbital rays of divine energy.
moveset: conjure rays of divine beams that singe the enemy
summon down rays of golden light that scorch all beneath them

Summon Angel.name: Summon Angel
Summon Angel.description: Gain the assistance of a powerful celestial entity.
moveset:
summon an Angel, beautiful and alien.
It unleashes a devastating heavenly flame from its eyes

pray, and the clouds part, as a golden titan slams
down its collosal golden blade onto the enemy

Hellfire.name: Hellfire
Hellfire.description: Conjure infernal flames that invoke the pain of sin.
moveset: release black flames from your hands
summon forth a stream of black and red fire

Otherworldly Tentacle.name: Otherworldly Tentacle
Otherworldly Tentacle.description: Reach into the far realms, and extract the aid of an Elder God.
moveset: point down, and a colossal tenticle slams down on your foe
summon a massive tentacle from beneath which swings at your foe

Summon Greater Demon.name: Summon Greater Demon
Summon Greater Demon.description: Gain the aid of a powerful entity, at the cost of your soul.
moveset: summon a writhing mountain. Its screech melts metal and skin

conjure a towering fiend. It looks back at you and
whispers 'soon' as it buries its spear in your foe

Lightning Bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
Lightning Bolt.description: Conjure a crackling bolt of electrical energy.
moveset: cast forth an electrical orb that shoots at your foe
unleash a beam of thunder that burns all in its path

Mind Blast.name: Mind Blast
Mind Blast.description: Use telepahy to subdue and weaken your opponent.
moveset: reach into the mind of your enemy, and crush it
conjure horrifying visions into the mind of your foe

Summon Meteor Shower.name: Summon Meteor Shower
Summon Meteor Shower.description: Cast down the very heavens onto your enemy.
moveset:
summon forth the skies above, and launch their
celestial bodies at your foe below
sever the skies, as comets and meteors rain down on your enemy

Bear Form.name: Bear Form
Bear Form.description: Assume the aspect of the ursine predator.
moveset: claw at your foe with massive paws
bite down with ferocious ursine strength

Plague.name: Plague
Plague.description: Summon forth insects and disease, and spoil heart and land.
moveset: call forth a swarm of locust that gnaw at your enemy
conjure an ill air that ravages the insides of your opponent

Elemental Fury.name: Elemental Fury
Elemental Fury.description: Become one with the elements, unleashing their violence.
moveset:
strike down with a flaming arm, and blast
unto your foe a frigid blizzard

summon forth a great tide, and unleash a thunderstorm onto your
drowning foe

Poisonous Strike.name: Poisonous Strike
Poisonous Strike.description: Coat your blade with poison, and wound your foe.
moveset: grease your weapon with black ichor, and stab your foe
dip your weapon into a green mixture that melts ehtough metal, and strike

Throwing Blades.name: Throwing Blades
Throwing Blades.description: Rain down bladed death onto your enemies from afar.
moveset: jump back, releasing a handful of shuriken and throwing knives
unleash a torrent of blades from your pouches, each striking your foe

Shadowdance.name: Shadowdance
Shadowdance.description: Become one with shadows, then strike from darkness
moveset:
blend into shadow, and as darkness surrounds your foe
a legion of shadowy wraiths strike from the dark

disperse into darkness, and strike at your foe with infinite
blackened blades

God's Abandon.name: God's Abandon
God's Abandon.description: Cast down the gods, as you have been abandonned.
moveset: curse at the skies, unleashing thunder at your foe
recite the forbidden scriptures, melting the mind of your enemy

Surrounded by Ruins.name: Surrounded by Ruins
Surrounded by Ruins.description: As you've ever known is destroyed, and pieces of the past still follow.
moveset: call down a rain of ruined debris, broken temples, and shattered shrines
split the earth beneath, unearthing ancient stone and lava

Apotheosis.name: Apotheosis
Apotheosis.description: Ascend, and become that which abandonned you.
moveset:
teleport your foe through space and time, onto a dying world.
The cataclysm wreaks havoc on your foe

reach into the past and seize the Hammer of Creation. You strike
down, unmaking your opponent bit by bit
